mapper.select: SELECT post_num, post_title, post_filePath, post_content, post_regr_id, post_reg_dtime, post_disp_tf, post_proj_num FROM proj_post_board WHERE post_proj_num=#{num} AND post_disp_tf=0 ORDER BY post_num DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO proj_post_board (post_title, post_filePath, post_fileOrgName, post_fileSize, post_content, post_regr_id, post_modr_id, post_proj_num) VALUES(#{post_title}, #{post_filePath}, #{post_fileOrgName}, #{post_fileSize}, #{post_content}, #{post_regr_id}, #{post_modr_id}, #{post_proj_num})
mapper.update: UPDATE proj_post_board SET post_title=#{post_title}, post_filePath=#{post_filePath}, post_fileOrgName=#{post_fileOrgName}, post_fileSize=#{post_fileSize}, post_content=#{post_content}, post_modr_id=#{post_modr_id}, post_mod_dtime=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE post_num=#{post_num} AND post_proj_num=#{post_proj_num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POST_CMT (cmt_imgPath, cmt_content, cmt_proj_num, cmt_post_num, cmt_regr_id, cmt_modr_id) VALUES(#{cmt_imgPath}, #{cmt_content}, #{cmt_proj_num},#{cmt_post_num}, #{cmt_regr_id}, #{cmt_modr_id})
